text: The 2007 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship was the 10th UEM Individual Speedway Junior European Championship season. The Final took place on August 19, 2007 in Częstochowa, Poland. European Championship was won by Nicolai Klindt from Denmark. == Calendar == {| class=wikitable !width=80px|Day ||width=110px|Venue ||width=160px|Winner ||width=40px| |- !colspan=4| Domestic Qualifications |- |align=center| 13 April | Opole | Maciej Piaszczyński |align=center| result |- !colspan=4| Qualifying Round |- |align=center| 28 April | Brăila | canceled |align=center| result |- !colspan=4| Semi-Finals |- |align=center| 28 May | Miskolc | Jurica Pavlič |align=center| result |- |align=center| 9 June | Seinäjoki | Nicolai Klindt |align=center| result |- |align=center| 14 July | Daugavpils | Martin Vaculík or Kevin Wölbertspeedway.org - 2008-04-11 |align=center| result |- !colspan=4| Final |- |align=center| 19 August | Częstochowa | Nicolai Klindt |align=center| result |} == Domestic Qualifications == === Poland === *Final of Domestic Qualification to Individual Junior European Championship *April 13, 2007 * Opole *Referee: Wojciech Grodzki *Attendance: 400 *Best Time: 62.3 - Grzegorz Zengota in 1st heat *Riders placed 1st to 4th in Domestic Final was qualify to the European Semi-Finals. Fifth Polish rider (Łopaczewski) was nominated (as wild card) by Main Commission of Speedway Sport (GKSŻ). Next 3 riders (Miturski, Szewczykowski and Kajoch) was started in Championships also, because they replaced riders from another country. {| class=wikitable !width=25px|Pos. ||width=200px|Rider ||width=40px|Points ||width=70px|Details |-align=center |1 ||align=left|(16) Maciej Piaszczyński (POZ) ||13 ||(3,3,2,2,3) |-align=center |2 ||align=left|(4) Michał Mitko (RYB) ||12 ||(2,2,2,3,3) |-align=center |3 ||align=left|(1) Grzegorz Zengota (ZIE) ||10+2+3+3 ||(3,1,1,2,3) |-align=center |4 ||align=left|(3) Rafał Fieger (RYB) ||10+3+2 ||(0,3,2,3,2) |-align=center |5 ||align=left |(2) Michał Łopaczewski (ŁÓD) ||10+3+1 ||(1,3,3,2,1) |-align=center |6 ||align=left |(9) Borys Miturski (CZE) ||10+1+2+0 ||(3,0,3,2,2) |-align=center |7 ||align=left |(6) Adrian Szewczykowski (GOR) ||10+2+1 ||(2,1,3,1,3) |-align=center |8 ||align=left |(13) Adam Kajoch (LES) ||9 ||(0,2,3,3,1) |-align=center |9 ||align=left|(5) Piotr Korbel (WRO) ||9 ||(3,3,1,1,1) |-align=center |10 ||align=left|(12) Rafał Klimek (LUB) ||8 ||(2,1,2,3,0) |-align=center |11 ||align=left|(15) Mateusz Kowalczyk (CZE) ||6 ||(2,2,0,0,2) |-align=center |12 ||align=left|(14) Mateusz Jurga (LES) ||5 ||(1,2,1,1,E) |-align=center |13 ||align=left|(11) Bartosz Szymura (OPO) ||3 ||(1,X,0,E,2) |-align=center |14 ||align=left|(17) Kamil Mistygacz (CZE) ||2 ||(1,E,1) |-align=center |15 ||align=left|(18) Emil Idziorek (OST) ||1 ||(0,1,D,F,D) |-align=center |16 ||align=left|(8) Marcel Kajzer (RAW) ||1 ||(1,0,X,-,N) |-align=center |17 ||align=left|(7) Damian Baliński jr (RAW) ||0 ||(0,F,-,-,N) |-align=center |18 ||align=left|(10) Marcin Piekarski (CZE) ||0 ||(0,-,-,-,-) |- |colspan=4| Gates in 21st: A - 66.3 - 64.8 - 64.9 - 63.9 17-24: 67.4 - 66.3 - 65.8 - 63.9 - 67.3 - 67.2 - 65.7 - 64.8 |} ==Qualification== *Semi-Final A: **May 28, 2007 ** Miskolc *Semi-Final B: **June 9, 2007 ** Seinäjoki *Semi-Final C: **July 14, 2007 ** Daugavpils == Final == *August 19, 2007 * Częstochowa {| width=100% |width=50% valign=top|Heat after heats: # Miturski, Laguta, Sundstroem (E3), Zengota (F/X) # Jonasson, Busch, Piaszczyński, Bogdanow # Pavlič, Šitera, Kajoch, Vaculik # Klindt, Wölbert, Hougaard, Andersen # Wölbert, Zengota, Kajoch, Busch (F4) # Laguta, Bogdanow, Pavlič, Andersen # Šitera, Hougaard, Sundstroem, Piaszczyński # Miturski, Klindt, Vaculik, Jonasson # Klindt, Bogdanow, Zengota, Šitera # Vaculik, Laguta, Busch, Hougaard # Jonasson, Sundstroem, Kajoch, Andersen # Pavlič, Miturski, Wölbert, Piaszczyński # Vaculik, Zengota, Andersen, Piaszczyński (E3) # Jonasson, Šitera, Wölbert, Laguta # Klindt, Busch, Pavlič, Sundstroem # Kajoch, Hougaard, Miturski, Bogdanow # Pavlič, Zengota, Jonasson, Hougaard # Klindt, Laguta, Kajoch, Piaszczyński # Vaculik, Bogdanow, Wölbert, Sundstroem # Šitera, Busch, Miturski, Andersen _3-6 place_ # Šitera, Miturski, Jonasson, Vaculik |width=50% valign=top| {| class=wikitable !width=25px| Pos. !!width=200px| Rider !!width=40px| Points !!width=70px| Heats |-align=center |1 ||align=left| (16) Nicolai Klindt ||14 ||(3,2,3,3,3) |-align=center |2 ||align=left| (10) Jurica Pavlič ||11 ||(3,1,3,1,3) |-align=center |3 ||align=left| (11) Filip Šitera ||10+3 ||(0,3,0,2,3) |-align=center |4 ||align=left| (4) Borys Miturski ||10+2 ||(3,3,2,1,1) |-align=center |5 ||align=left| (8) Thomas H.
